rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I think you've grown a mite too
attached to some of your Blades.

rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0003
rows.name:
With the Merc Group as prosperous
as it is, you should be able to manage
plenty of Blades now, no?

rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Well then, I'd urge you to try taking all
sorts of different Blades along with you
on your adventures.

rows.label: tlk45300143_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Variety is the spice of life, you know.
It'll help you grow as a Driver!
